categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Craige Graf was a Human male Imperial Intelligence agent who served the Sith Empire during the Cold War.
In 3643 BBY, Craige was part of an Inspection team during the Alderaan Civil War until they were captured by the Killiks. They were later freed by an Imperial spacer.
He and Stanel Andaren Thul later tasked the Imperial spacer with destroying a nearby fortress of House Ulgo.
